coreAttributes.name: cock pump
coreAttributes.description: Designed to slide over a person's penis via its open end, this hollow, plastic cylinder is connected to two tubes. One pressurises the container, while the other sucks up the cum that's spurted out of the wearer's cock.

replacementText.self:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] up the dial on the milking machine, before sliding the now-pressurised pump down over [npc.her] [npc.cock+]. #IF(npc.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_URETHRA_PENIS)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The cock-pump quickly drains [npc.namePos] urethra-creampie!)] #ENDIF
replacementText.other:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] up the dial on the milking machine, before sliding the now-pressurised pump down over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.cock+]. #IF(npc2.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_URETHRA_PENIS)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The cock-pump quickly drains [npc2.namePos] urethra-creampie!)] #ENDIF
replacementText.otherRough:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(crank)] up the dial on the milking machine, before roughly shoving the now-pressurised pump down over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.cock+]. #IF(npc2.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_URETHRA_PENIS)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The cock-pump quickly drains [npc2.namePos] urethra-creampie!)] #ENDIF

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before letting the rapidly-depressurising pump slide off of [npc.her] [npc.cock+].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before letting the rapidly-depressurising pump slide off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.cock+].
displacementText.otherRough: With no regard for [npc2.her] comfort, [npc.name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the still-pressurised pump off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.cock+].
